id.charname: Trần Văn Đức / 陈文德 / "Ancient Culture Virtue"
id.story: Đức was part of the unsuccessful resistance against the Túyàngan invaders in the neighboring nation of Đại Nam (大南, "Big South"). He has since relocated, along with a sizeable Đạinamese community, attempting to rebuild in Kausao City, with the eventual dream of liberating Đạinam from the 图样人 devils. (文 is a very typical male Đạinamese middle name, and the custom is to refer to one by personal name, like Đức). I see the Đạinamese community in Kausao as having several parallels to the Tauron community in Caprica City. The Browncoat analogy applies more to Đức and some others as individuals.
